huffmanEncodingScheme

Class kol2CS21120Assign

  • java.lang.Object
    • huffmanEncodingScheme.kol2CS21120Assign

  • public class kol2CS21120Assign
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class performs all the most important things and stores the information about loaded file, characters and builded trees. It aslo includes methods to perform the compressing and analyzing results of it.
    Author:
    Konrad Lopuszynski

    • Method Detail

      • readTheFile

        public void readTheFile()
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Performs the loading the file and stores the content in variable of String type.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - supports errors if the file is not found

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the fields of object and set the initial values.

      • setLengthOfFile

        public void setLengthOfFile()
        Sets the length of text contained in file.

      • perform

        public void perform()
             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Calls all the functions needed to loaded the file, counting the number of characters and their frequency and building the Huffman binary tree.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - supports errors if the file is not found

      • countCharacters

        public void countCharacters()
        Function to counting the quantity of characters. It adds the objects of character class to linked list and calls the function to sort it.

      • buildTheTree

        public void buildTheTree()
        Creates copy of linked list storing the characters and performs the algorithm to create the Huffman tree. Create additional nodes throught joining the characters of the lowest frequency and sets the connections between them.

      • sortLinkedList

        public void sortLinkedList(java.util.LinkedList<huffmanEncodingScheme.tree> l)
        Sorting of LinkedList by frequency of objects of tree class. It uses the bubble sort algorithm.
        Parameters:
        l - LinkedList of objects of tree class.

      • setBinaryCode

        public void setBinaryCode(huffmanEncodingScheme.tree currentTree,
                          java.lang.String code,
                          java.lang.String addBit)
        Sets the binary code of each node. This is a recursive function which sets the code and while the type of node does't equals "LEAVE" it calls itself for children of the node. The pasted bit is '0' for left children (node of higher frequency) and '1' for right children. At this point the hashtable, storing a characters codes, is created and character is sets as a key.
        Parameters:
        currentTree - - node which the function sets the binary code for
        code - - the code of parent node of this node
        addBit - - value of bit what should be past to parent's code

      • compressedCode

        public java.lang.String compressedCode()
                                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Returns the compressed file as a string of bits using a hashtable storing values of binary code for each character.
        Returns:
        string of bits for compressed file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - supports errors if the file is not found

      • printTheBook

        public void printTheBook()
        Prints the characters with their associated binary codes.

      • compressedLenght

        public int compressedLenght()
        Calculates the size of bits after compression.
        Returns:
        the number of bits

      • analyze

        public void analyze()
             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Function used to performing and printing the results of analysis the compression. It shows the size of file before and after compression, the compresion ratio, height of Huffman binary tree and number of all nodes including the nodes of characters. Additionaly it print what part of the initial file is a compressed file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - supports errors if the file is not found

      • menu

        public void menu()
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This function asks user for choose the one of following options:
        1. Compress the file. - Calls the perform() function to load the file and create Huffman binary tree as well as a book of characters
        2. Show the analysis of compression. - Checks the file has been already loaded and calls the analyze() function.
        3. Print the book of characters. -Checks the file has been already loaded and calls the printTheBook() function.
        4. Print encoded file. - Calls the text contained in file as the encoded string of bits.
        5. Exit. - The end of the program.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - supports errors if the file is not found

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.lang.InterruptedException
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
